Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

gavaah hai spasht kitaab
nissandeh hamane use ek barakat bharee raat mein avatarit kiya hai. - nishchay hee ham saavadhaan karanevaale hai.
us (raat) mein tamaam tatvadarshita yukt maamalon ka faisala kiya jaata hai
hamaare yahaan se aadesh ke roop mein. nissandeh rasoolon ko bhejanevaale ham hee hai.
tumhaare rab kee dayaaluta ke kaaran. nissandeh vahee sab kuchh sunanevaala, jaananevaala hai
aakaashon aur dharatee ka rab aur jo kuchh un donon ke beech hai usaka bhee, yadi tum vishvaas rakhanevaale ho (to vishvaas karo ki kitaab ka avataran allaah kee dayaaluta hai)
usake atirikt koee poojy-prabhu nahin; vahee jeevit karata aur maarata hai; tumhaara rab aur tumhaare agale baap-daadon ka rab hai
balki ve sandeh mein pade rahe hain
achchha to tum us din kee prateeksha karo, jab aakaash pratyaksh dhuna laega.
vah logon ka dhaank lega. yah hai dukhad yaatana
ve kahenge, "ai hamaare rab! hamapar se yaatana hata de. ham eemaan laate hai.
ab unake hosh mein aane ka mauqa kahaan baaqee raha. unaka haal to yah hai ki unake paas saaf-saaf bataanevaala ek rasool aa chuka hai.
phir unhonne usakee or se munh mod liya aur kahane lage, "yah to ek sikhaaya-padhaaya deevaana hai.
ham yaatana thoda hata dete hai to tum punah phir jaate ho.
yaad rakho, jis din ham badee pakad pakadenge, to nishchay hee ham badala lekar rahenge
unase pahale ham firaun kee qaum ke logon ko pareeksha mein daal chuke hain, jabaki unake paas ek atyant sajjan rasool aaya
ki "tum allaah ke bandon ko mere havaale kar do. nishchay hee mai tumhaare lie ek vishvasaneey rasool hoon
aur allaah ke muqaabale mein sarakashee na karo, main tumhaare lie ek spasht pramaan lekar aaya hoon
aur main isase apane rab aur tumhaare rab kee sharan le chuka hoon ki tum mujh par patharaav karake maar daalo
kintu yadi tum meree baat nahin maanate to mujhase alag ho jao
antatah usane apane rab ko pukaara ki "ye aparaadhee log hai.
achchha tum raaton raat mere bandon ko lekar chale jao. nishchay hee tumhaara peechha kiya jaega
aur saagar ko sthir chhod do. ve to ek sena dal hain, doob jaanevaale.
ve chhod gaye kitanai hee baag aur srot
aur khetiyaan aur uttam aavaas
aur sukh saamagree jinamen ve maze kar rahe the.
ham aisa hee maamala karate hai, aur un cheezon ka vaaris hamane doosare logon ko banaaya
phir na to aakaash aur dharatee ne unapar vilaap kiya aur na unhen muhalat hee milee
is prakaar hamane isaraeel kee santaan ko apamaanajanak yaatana se
arthaat firaun se chhutakaara diya. nishchay hee vah maryaadaaheen logon mein se bada hee sarakash tha
aur hamane (unakee sthiti ko) jaanate hue unhen saare sansaaravaalon ke muqaabale man chun liya
aur hamane unhen nishaaniyon ke dvaara vah cheez dee jisamen spasht pareeksha thee
ye log badee drdhataapoorvak kahate hai
bas yah hamaaree pahalee mrtyu hee hai, ham dobaara uthae jaanevaale nahin hain
to le aao hamaare baap-daada ko, yadi tum sachche ho
kya ve achchhe hai ya tubba kee qaum ya ve log jo unase pahale guzar chuke hai? hamane unhen vinasht kar diya, nishchay hee ve aparaadhee the
hamane aakaashon aur dharatee ko aur jo kuchh unake beech hai unhen khel nahin banaaya
hamane unhen haq ke saath paida kiya, kintu unamen se adhikakar log jaanate nahin
nishchay hee faisale ka din un sabaka niyat samay hai
jis din koee apana kisee apane ke kuchh kaam na aaega aur na koee sahaayata pahunchegee
sivaay us vyakti ke jisapar allaah daya kare. nishchay hee vah prabhutvashaalee, atyant dayaavaan hai
nissandeh zaqqoom ka vrksh
gunahagaar ka bhojan hoga
tel kee talachhat jaisa, vah peton mein khaulata hoga
jaise garm paanee khaulata hai
pakado use, aur bhadakatee huee aag ke beech tak ghaseet le jao
phir usake sir par khaulate hue paanee ka yaatana undel do
maza chakh, too to bada balashaalee, sajjan aur aadaraneey hai
yahee to hai jisake vishay mein tum sandeh karate the.
nissandeh dar rakhanevaale nishchintata kee jagah honge
baagon aur sroton mein
baareek aur gaadhe resham ke vastr pahane hue, ek-doosare ke aamane-saamane upasthit honge
aisa hee unake saath maamala hoga. aur ham saaf goree, badee netrovaalee striyon se unaka vivaah kar denge
ve vahaan nishchintata ke saath har prakaar ke svaadisht phal mangavaate honge
vahaan ve mrtyu ka maza kabhee na chakhege. bas pahalee mrtyu jo huee, so huee. aur usane unhen bhadakatee huee aag kee yaatana se bacha liya
yah sab tumhaare rab ke vishesh udaar anugrah ke kaaran hoga, vahee badee saphalata hai
hamane to is (quraan) ko bas tumhaaree bhaasha mein sahaj evan sugam bana diya hai taaki ve yaadadihaanee praapt (karen)
achchha tum bhee prateeksha karo, ve bhee prateeksha mein hain
